summary: The wife of a murdered petrochemical company chairman and a banker investigating the liquidity of his new bank stumble upon an international financial scheme that could lead to global economic collapse.
cast: Jane Fonda|Kris Kristofferson|Hume Cronyn|Josef Sommer|Bob Gunton|Macon McCalman|Ron Frazier|Jodi Long|Crocker Nevin|Marvin Chatinover|Ira Wheeler|Paul Hecht|Norman Snow|Nelly Hoyos|Lansdale Chatfield|Sally Sockwell|Martha Plimpton|Gaby Glatzer|Howard Erskine|Michael Fiorello|Marilyn Berger|Alex Wipf|Ahmed Yacoubi|Charlie Laiken|Stanley Simmonds|E. Brian Dean|James Sutton|Joel Stedman|Garrison Lane|Nina Reeves|Michael Prince|Carolyn Larsen|Carolyn Larson|Ron Vaad|Rebecca Brooks|Richard Barbour|Danny Redmon|Eric Bethancourt|Steve Ballard|Neela Eriksen|Lawrence Sellars|Ernie Garrett|Art Hansen|Ira Lewis|Sharon Casey|Bernie Rachelle|Keith Eager|David Ellsworth|Art Lambert|Bill Anagnos|Ahmed Boulane|Robert Dahdah|Geretta Geretta|Jery Hewitt|Richmond Hoxie|Lora Mitchell|Deborah Watkins
title: Una mujer de negocios
